title: 16. Exit Interview: Schools Chancellor, NYC
description: Having already amassed an eventful resume -- the Clinton White House, the Department of Justice, and Bertelsmann -- Joel I. Klein spent the past eight years at chancellor of the biggest school system in the country. So what'd he learn?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
